name: Bubble Soda Story
description:
🍇🍈🍉🍒🍎🍑🍋🥝🍌Bubble Soda Story is a colorful, fun & highly addictive bubble shooter game that’ll keep you playing for hours! Enjoy the awesomeness about slicing fruit and juice splashing, this bubble shooter game is great to pass the time!

🍇🍈🍉🍒🍎🍑🍋🥝🍌

Fire your bubble shooter to collect drinks! Aim, match and smash the bubbles to help them collect bottle top or defeat animal BOSS. Each bubble will bring you closer to the sweet and delicious soda!

Try Bubble Soda Story - the best free bubble shooter game!

🥤🥤HOW TO PLAY🥤🥤
🍹 Aim carefully and tap where you want your bubble shooter to go!
🍹 Match 3 or more same colored bubbles to make them disappear!
🍹 Special boosters & exciting items to help you pass trickier levels.

🥤🥤SPECIAL FEATURES🥤🥤
🧉 TONS OF UNIQUE & EXCITING LEVELS!
🧉 EASY AND FUN PLAY! Simple to learn and fun to master!
🧉 CONNECT TO FACEBOOK! Share the fun with your friends!
🧉 NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Play offline!
